p: It is considered important to use information to assist in the evaluation of the health situation for decision making, in order to direct intersectoral, educational and health education actions [ 19]. Observational studies in epidemiology have the potential to influence clinical practice, as they provide evidence and allow inferring spatial and temporal variations, projecting future scenarios. In this context, this study aimed to describe the epidemiological situation of dengue in Brazil in the last three decades.
